```{r}
load("../data/infarctus_complet.rda")
infarctus
```
```{r}
set.seed(30)
n <- nrow(infarctus)
tr <- sample(1:n, as.integer(0.7 * n))
train_data <- infarctus[tr, ]
test_data  <- infarctus[-tr, ]
dim(train_data)  # ~70
dim(test_data)   # ~31
```
```{r}
classe_maj <- names(which.max(table(train_data$PRONO)))
classe_maj  

pred_major <- rep(classe_maj, nrow(test_data))

true_labels <- test_data$PRONO
err_major <- mean(pred_major != true_labels)
err_major
```
```{r}
library(MASS)
```
```{r}
qda_model <- qda(PRONO ~ ., data = train_data)
qda_pred <- predict(qda_model, newdata = test_data)
qda_classes <- qda_pred$class
err_qda <- mean(qda_classes != test_data$PRONO)
err_qda
```
```{r}
conf_mat <- table(Pred = qda_classes, True = test_data$PRONO)
conf_mat
```
```{r}
VP = 10 / ( 10 + 4 )
VN = 14 / ( 14 + 3 )
VP
VN
```
```{r}
qda_probs <- qda_pred$posterior
cost_matrix <- matrix(c(0, 1, 5, 0), nrow = 2, byrow = TRUE)
expected_cost <- qda_probs %*% t(cost_matrix)
cost_pred <- apply(expected_cost, 1, which.min)
cost_pred <- as.character(cost_pred)
err_cost <- mean(cost_pred != test_data$PRONO)
err_cost
```
```{r}
conf_cost <- table(Pred = cost_pred, True = test_data$PRONO)
conf_cost
```
